heading: Fluence, the energy storage systems developer, is now worth over $1 billion after QIA investment
body: The Qatar Investment Authority is investing $125 million into energy storage systems integrator and power management tech developer, Fluence, in a deal that will value the company at over $1 billion.

heading: Dear Sophie: Tips for getting a National Interest green card by myself?
body: I really want permanent residence, but I never won a Nobel prize; I’m single; and I don’t have a million dollars yet. However, I think I might qualify for an EB-2 NIW green card.
